message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about plant biology. Plants are the only organisms that absorb nutrients from the soil through their roots. Option (A) is incorrect because flour is a product made from ground grains and does not absorb nutrients. Option (B) is incorrect because power plants are human-made structures that produce electricity. Option (C) is incorrect because animals obtain nutrients from plants or other animals they consume, not directly from the soil.

This question requires basic knowledge about the process of nutrient absorption by plants. Flora, or plants, absorb nutrients from the soil into themselves through their roots. Option (A) is incorrect because flour is a processed form of grain and does not have roots to absorb nutrients. Option (B) is incorrect because power plants, in the context of this question, refer to electricity-generating facilities and not living organisms. Option (C) is incorrect because animals do not have roots to absorb nutrients from the soil.

This question requires basic knowledge about plants and their nutrient absorption process. Plants, or flora, absorb nutrients from the soil into themselves through their roots. Option (A) is incorrect because flour is a processed product and does not have the ability to absorb nutrients. Option (B) is incorrect because power plants are man-made structures and do not have the ability to absorb nutrients. Option (C) is incorrect because while animals can consume plants for nutrients, they do not absorb the nutrients directly from the soil.

Flora refers to the collective group of plant species, and plants absorb nutrients from the soil into themselves through their roots. Option (A) is incorrect because flour is a product made from ground grains and does not absorb nutrients. Option (B) is incorrect because power plants are facilities that generate electricity and are not capable of absorbing nutrients. Option (C) is incorrect because animals do not absorb nutrients directly from soil but rather obtain them through the consumption of plants or other animals.
